entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning and risk of freezing rain. Clearing this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this morning then west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
